title: The stealth strategy pays off: UARX Space emerges as Europeâ€™s high-reliability powerhouse
summary: UARX Space, a Spanish space technology company, has emerged from stealth mode with a focus on high-reliability orbital systems, including in-orbit logistics, separation systems, and avionics. The company has achieved flight heritage, secured contracts, and received recognition from ESA, positioning itself as a key player in Europe's space ecosystem.
why_it_matters: UARX Space's approach highlights the importance of technical rigor and flight heritage in the space industry, offering sovereign European capabilities and reducing reliance on third-party integrators. Its dual-use certification and partnerships underscore its strategic value for both commercial and defense sectors.
